seller_details.name: Gujarat Freight Tools
seller_details.address: Plot No A 64, Road No 21, Indl Waghle Estate, Mumbai, Maharashtra - 400604

line_items.product_description: Bosch All-in-One Metal Hand Tool Kit

terms_and_conditions: Subject Our Responsibility Ceases as soon as goods leaves our Premises.
Goods once sold will not taken back.

summary.text: This invoice from Gujarat Freight Tools to M/S Shiv Engineering details the sale of two tool kits. The total taxable amount is 3805.00, with an 18% GST applied on each item. The total amount after tax is 4490.00. Bank details and specific terms and conditions are also included.
summary.reasoning: The invoice is rejected because GSTIN numbers for both the seller (Gujarat Freight Tools) and the buyer (M/S Shiv Engineering) are missing from the document, despite GST being applied on the items. This makes the invoice non-compliant with GST regulations.
